
            <h1 class="postTitle">

    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">上周热点回顾（2.10-2.16）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>热点随笔：</p>
<p>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/archive/2025/02/13/18712410.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">本地部署 DeepSeek：小白也能轻松搞定！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/" 的人都不知道的使用技巧</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jinjiangongzuoshi/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">狂师</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/robots2/archive/2025/02/10/18707552.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">本地搭建DeepSeek和知识库 Dify做智能体Agent(推荐)</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/robots2/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">黑水滴</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/kaigejava/archive/2025/02/11/18709541.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">DeepSeek-R1本地部署如何选择适合你的版本?看这里</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/kaigejava/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">kaizi1992</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/archive/2025/02/14/18714692.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">如何给本地部署的DeepSeek投喂数据，让他更懂你</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">程序员晓凡</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/didispace/archive/2025/02/10/18707488.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">拒绝繁忙！免费使用 deepseek-r1:671B 参数满血模型</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/didispace/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">程序猿DD</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jinjiangongzuoshi/archive/2025/02/12/18710936.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">自己如何在本地电脑从零搭建DeepSeek！手把手教学，快来看看！ (建议收藏)</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jinjiangongzuoshi/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">狂师</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/samlin/archive/2025/02/10/18708955.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">DeepSeek本地化部署超简单，比装个office还简单</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/samlin/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Sam Lin</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lsjwq/archive/2025/02/10/18707538.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">基于deepseek模型知识库，Cherry Studio和AnythingLLM使用效果对比</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lsjwq/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">iNeuOS工业互联网系统</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/sdcb/archive/2025/02/10/20250209-configure-deepseek-in-chats.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Sdcb Chats 重磅更新：深度集成 DeepSeek-R1，思维链让 AI 更透明！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/sdcb/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">.NET骚操作</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/archive/2025/02/12/18710857.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">传国玉玺易主，ai.com竟然跳转到国产AI</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">程序员晓凡</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/hiit/archive/2025/02/12/18711461.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">基于DeepSeek R1 满血版大模型的个人知识库，回答都源自对你专属文件的深度学习。</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/hiit/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">HIIT</a>)</p>
<p>热点新闻：</p>
